mapper.select: select id, ProjectNum, SFid, DeptName, StageNum, StageRadio from dbo.ST_UserStage where ProjectNum = #{projectnum} and UserName=#{username}
select id, ProjectNum, SFid, DeptName, StageNum, StageRadio from dbo.ST_UserStage limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select count(distinct(a.ProjectNum)) as projectCount,SFid FROM ST_ProjectStage a,ST_UserStage b where a.ProjectStage='P1'and a.ProjectNum=b.ProjectNum and a.ProjectStage=b.StageNum and a.StartDate > #{startYear}+'-01-01' and a.StartDate <#{endYear}+'-01-01' group by a.ProjectNum,SFid
mapper.insert: insert into dbo.ST_UserStage(ProjectNum, SFid, DeptName, StageNum, StageRadio,UserName,showstatus) values (#{projectnum}, #{sfid}, #{deptname}, #{stagenum}, #{stageradio},#{UserName},#{showstatus})
mapper.select: SELECT DeptName,SUM(a.PointBase*b.StageRadio*c.StageRadio) as totalPoint FROM [Chint.Oa.WorkFlow.lvElecCenter].[dbo].[ST_ProjectAbout] a left join ST_ProjectStage b on a.ProjectNum=b.ProjectNum join ST_UserStage c on b.ProjectStage=c.StageNum where a.ProjectNum=c.ProjectNum group by DeptName
select count(distinct(a.ProjectNum)) as projectCount,DeptName FROM ST_ProjectStage a,ST_UserStage b where a.ProjectNum=b.ProjectNum and a.ProjectStage=b.StageNum group by a.ProjectNum,DeptName
mapper.update:
update dbo.ST_UserStage
ProjectNum = #{projectnum},
SFid = #{sfid},
DeptName = #{deptname},
StageNum = #{stagenum},
StageRadio = #{stageradio},
where ProjectNum = #{projectnum} and UserName=#{UserName}
update ST_UserStage set showstatus=0 where ProjectNum=#{projectNum} and UserName=#{userName}
